resources.name: Community Food Bank
resources.description: Provides weekly food parcels to families in need. No appointment necessary, walk-ins welcome Monday-Friday 9am-5pm.

resources.name: Safe Haven Housing Services
resources.description: Emergency housing assistance and transitional housing programs for individuals experiencing homelessness.

resources.name: Wellness Center Mental Health Clinic
resources.description: Sliding scale mental health services including therapy, psychiatry, and group counseling. Accepting new patients.

resources.name: Skills Forward Employment Center
resources.description: Free job training, resume assistance, and job placement services for unemployed and underemployed individuals.

resources.name: Community Legal Services
resources.description: Pro bono legal assistance for family law, housing disputes, and criminal record expungement.

resources.name: Metro Community Health Center
resources.description: Primary care, dental, and pharmacy services on a sliding fee scale. No insurance required.

resources.name: Ride Share Program
resources.description: Free transportation vouchers for medical appointments, job interviews, and essential services.
